message: Take it or leave it, Bob. This is my first offer and the money will be worth less for me in the next round.
The money will be worth significantly less for you in the next round, Alice.  I'm offering you a fair deal to end this now.
This is my final offer, Bob.  If you reject it, you risk getting nothing in the next round.  I'm taking a significant loss, but I'm willing to compromise to end this game.
